it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client

Class ClientRMIInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client.ClientRMIInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkInterface

    public class ClientRMIInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkInterface
    RMI version of the connection interface

    Gets a remotely callable instance of the server, and provides to the game server a remotely callable instance of the client

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientRMIInterface() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean close()
      Implements the NetworkInterface method close witouth actually doing nothing.
      boolean connect()
      Explores all the server ports looking for an available remote registry.
      void startInterface()
      Get a view instance via ViewFactory and then starts an own RMI registry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientRMIInterface

        public ClientRMIInterface()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect()
        Explores all the server ports looking for an available remote registry. Discharge from that server registry the remote server handler that the client will use to register himself and his remote object in the starting game
        Specified by:
        connect in interface NetworkInterface
        Returns:
        true if connection has been successful on any port, false otherwise

      • startInterface

        public void startInterface()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get a view instance via ViewFactory and then starts an own RMI registry. With the previously discharged server handler lead the server to discharge the instance of the remote client handler that server will use during the game to call the needed methods.
        Specified by:
        startInterface in interface NetworkInterface
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        See Also:
        ViewFactory

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Implements the NetworkInterface method close witouth actually doing nothing. (method only required for socket connections)
        Specified by:
        close in interface NetworkInterface
